mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record_info (user_id, amount, catalog_id, type, record_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{amount}, #{catalogId}, #{type}, #{recordTime}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE record_info SET user_id = #{userId}, amount = #{amount}, catalog_id = #{catalogId}, `type` = #{type}, record_time = #{recordTime}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT catalog_info.id, catalog_info.user_id AS userId, amount, catalog_id AS catalogId, catalog_info.`type`, record_time AS recordTime, head_url AS headUrl, catalog_info.name AS catalogName FROM record_info left join catalog_info on catalog_id = catalog_info.id left join user_info on user_info.id = record_info.user_id WHERE record_time < #{time} AND record_info.user_id = #{userId} AND record_time > #{endTime}
